answers.answer: Since you have a lot of medical problems, your situation is very complicated.  No one here is a doctor, so I think you would be wise to ask one of your own doctors, someone who knows your medical history, for advice about this new pain.

question: For the last week ive been having a really bad pain in between my shoulders thats really bad If I lay down I have alot of health issues like mody diabetes,  heart problems, kidney impairment ellis danlos syndrome and if I raise my right arm the blood flow to it almost stops but im quie worried about the pain in my back can anyone got any ideas please im female and 42
title: ms
